snippet.title: C64 Game - Ancipital (83% completed)
snippet.description:
EPILEPTICS: AVOID!

Here is a somewhat unknown shooter from Jeff Minter, master of retro game psychedelia and weirdness.

You play the goat-man of the title who's mission is to navigate through a labyrinth (over 70 screens), blowing open doors in the walls by shooting baddies in the correct way, and finding camel-keys to open others, as indicated on the mini-map. 

There is also a timer (T icon) that when hits zero, allows the doors to become active.

You can also spell out the word "GOATS" if you collect enough animals on the way, which I think completes the game.

I had to resort to infinite lives and energy after a while, as this gets too frenetic. Couldn't figure out how to get past the Rory Plays Guitar screen, thus ending the game :(
